an10.100:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an10.100:1.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ, mānaṃ—
an10.100:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme appahāya abhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an10.100:2.1: Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ.
an10.100:2.3: Rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ, issaṃ, macchariyaṃ, mānaṃ—
an10.100:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme pahāya bhabbo arahattaṃ sacchikātun”ti.
